title: Tomato and basil soup with the best ever garlic bread
description: Roasted garlic and top-quality tinned tomatoes make all the difference to this simple soup. To simplify the garlic bread, just mix the roasted garlic with softened butter.Equipment and preparation: you will need a free-standing mixer, clean sheet of muslin and stick-blender or food processor.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 large bunch basil, roughly chopped, 2 sprigs reserved
1 small baguette, cut lengthways into 4 pieces
